Question
========
Which command renders a Quarto document without opening a preview?

Answerlist
----------
* quarto render name-of-file.qmd
* quarto preview name-of-file.qmd
* quarto check
* quarto --version

Solution
========
`quarto render` produces the output file without running the live preview.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
